mapper.select: /* 최종 잔고금액과 하루치 거래정보를 계산한 결과 */ SELECT A.ACT_SEQ , DATE_FORMAT(B.TRD_DT, '%Y%m%d') AS AGG_DT , A.BLC_AMT + ((SUM(B.AMT) - SUM(NVL(B.FEE, 0))) - SUM(NVL(B.TAX, 0))) AS B FROM (SELECT * FROM AC_BL_AG X WHERE X.ACT_SEQ = #{actSeq} AND X.AGG_DT = (SELECT MAX(Y.AGG_DT) FROM AC_BL_AG Y WHERE X.ACT_SEQ = Y.ACT_SEQ)) A INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM AC_DT X WHERE X.ACT_SEQ = #{actSeq} AND DATE_FORMAT(X.TRD_DT, '%Y%m%d') = (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MIN(Y.TRD_DT), '%Y%m%d') FROM AC_DT Y WHERE X.ACT_SEQ = Y.ACT_SEQ AND Y.TRD_DT > (SELECT DATE_ADD(MAX(Z.AGG_DT), INTERVAL 1 DAY) FROM AC_BL_AG Z WHERE Y.ACT_SEQ = Z.ACT_SEQ))) B ON A.ACT_SEQ = B.ACT_SEQ GROUP BY A.ACT_SEQ, A.AGG_DT, A.BLC_AMT, DATE_FORMAT(B.TRD_DT, '%Y%m%d')
